name: Nutmeg (Ground)
properties: Works well with breakfast foods and sweet applications
Complements fruits, especially bananas and berries
Used in both sweet and savory dishes
benefits: Nutmeg is a warming spice with anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. It enhances the flavor of whole grain breakfast dishes and pairs naturally with fruits. Traditionally used in small amounts to add warmth and depth to both sweet and savory preparations.
amount: 1/8 to 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg per recipe (4 servings)
